channel.title: [PI] ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
channel.description: [code]Map amount = 660508 Object Amount: 38424 WROTE THE LOC FILES INTO CACHE - Dir; C:/Vindictive317/ 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 2258 at Animable_Sub5.method457(Animable_Sub5.java:52) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:38) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:13) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1313) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1040) at client.method146(client.java:14423) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9260) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10430) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:161) at client.run(client.java:5268) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code] Clueless. Happens when I run towards the chicken area in lumby.

item.title: [PI] ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
item.dc:creator: @Nice_Boots Nice Boots
item.description:
@Nice_Boots wrote:

Ambokile:

Open up Animable_Sub5 and post your method457 code.

private ObjectDef method457() { int i = -1; if(anInt1601 != -1) { VarBit varBit = VarBit.cache[anInt1601]; int k = varBit.anInt648; int l = varBit.anInt649; int i1 = varBit.anInt650; int j1 = client.anIntArray1232[i1 - l]; i = clientInstance.variousSettings[k] >> l & j1; } else if(anInt1602 != -1) i = clientInstance.variousSettings[anInt1602]; if(i < 0 || i >= anIntArray1600.length || anIntArray1600[i] == -1) return null; else return ObjectDef.forID(anIntArray1600[i]); }

item.title: [PI] ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Simply put, your array holds multiple information values in one array. Let’s say your code says the array holds 10 values. Your trying to access the 11th value, you need to make the array able to store 11 values. In RSPS I’ve forgotten how you do that, you’ll have to browse around or get some help sorry.

Read full topic
